"A.P.239/5/6":
"Yo, Partner, you've come.
It's the usual, we're still being dragged."
"But, it's not too bad."
"Yuc-nee just shy to talk about herself to others, especially with what she went through."
"But I think it's therapeutic to talk to someone else other than me."
"Well, that is of course, if they stop fighting long enough to talk..."
"I haven't had the chance to go back to the ARKS Ship. How are things up there?"

"I've heard from Io and Fourier
There's going to be changes to the management of the ship or something. Do they not need your assistance with this?"
"I remember talking about the same thing, about changing the management system, back in our time."
"Speaking from experience. don't bother. It's better to quit now, than eventually something happening in the future."
"By the way. I somehow smell the scent of Xion."
"How's Xion? Is she doing well?"
"1. Xion no longer exists"
"2. Xiao has taken her place"
"Oh, Xion is no longer there? She's gone?"

"There's a copy-like child?
But no Xion.
Is that so..."

"Xiao? Who's that?
That means Xion's copy exists?
Where did Xion go?"
"I see... Xion has passed away. I see..."
"Even if the copy exists, it's still not Xion. Xion is gone..."
"Oh, I remembered something. We have also tried to copy Xion."
"And we failed, each time."
"This was the story of the End of the Photoners."
"Photoners were spread across the universe. In order to manage the vast universe of our civilization, we tried to make a copy of Xion."
"The first was a success. However, we failed in that it couldn't be controlled at all, so we threw it away in subspace."
"I don't know if it was subspace or another dimension entirely, but to treat it as if it were garbage... You cannot treat others as you so please."
"That's right. And I think so too."
"It was punishment, surely."
"Failure after failure. We finally created another success, something that we were able to control."
"The selfish desires we, Photoners, had at the time; Our desires and thoughts, influenced it..."
"...And became the [Profound Darkness]."
"And so, because of that. The malicious desires of others, I suppose is part of human nature."
"Why are you... How do you know that much? Were you apart of this?"
"Apart of it? Hah, I can't say I was. I wasn't interested in that."
"There was only one thing in my mind at the time. To polish my beauty."
"I captured all the hearts in the universe. The most beautiful woman of all Photoners. Said to be the Goddess of Beauty herself."
"Even military personnel and politicians. If you were a man, you were to watch yourself near me."
"Even with their complaints, they still boasted their secrets to me at night."
"Really, I've heard all sorts of things. Things I wanted to hear and things I did not. Sometimes I wished I could forget."
"I wanted to close my ears. I've heard stories of power struggles and evil intent on others."
"I wanted to defeat these types of people. I really dislike this ugliness... It's true."
"Yet, I was desperate enough on defeating all of the girls who would become my rivals."
